RelatedSentence: - Vermont Tech is now accepting applications through the first week of June for its first AeroCamp , a one - week camp for youth ages 12-18 who want to expand their knowledge of the aviation world and the training needed for careers in the aviation industry .

Participants will learn first - hand about the dynamics of airplanes and flight , as well as have the opportunity to fly several types of aircraft , including gliders , single engine planes and seaplanes .
The first program of its kind in Vermont , AeroCamp also includes a thorough educational component and field trips to explore the aerospace industry .

For individuals who want to pursue careers in the aviation industry , Vermont Tech also offers the Professional Pilot Technology degree program , which prepares students to become certified flight instructors , as well as outfitting graduates of the program with multiple Federal Aviation Administration ( FAA ) certificates and ratings .
